story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Web Hosting Services, Reseller Hosting, and Dedicated Servers by HostGator
caption: hostgator.com
description: HostGator is a leading provider of web hosting, reseller hosting, and dedicated servers. Over 5,000,000 websites trust HostGator for their web hosting needs.

data.message: godaddy is not a professional one, use hostgator or bluehost instead

Dude, Godaddy sucks! they don't even have live support! i have been with hostgator since 2006 till now and it's amazing! their support is always online and they reallly help. With godaddy i had a client who has his hosting with Godaddy, a problem happened with the email and i contacted their support guess after how much time they answered?! it took them 6 MONTHS to reply my fucking email :@ so i recommend HostGator for sure :)
